title: WTB: OM Southern Leaguers and Short Prints & Rare Backs
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTB: OM Southern Leaguers and Short Prints & Rare Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for these guys in OM backs, raw (fair to very good) or graded in the 1.5-3 range.

List:

Scoops Carey
Cad Coles (Big priority) 
Roy Ellam
Arch Persons
Bill Hart
Lentz
Ed Foster (Biggest priority) 
Charlie Fritz
Tom Guiheen
Bill Hart (Little Rock)
Ernie Howard (Savannah)
Dutch Jordan (Atlanta)
J.F. Kiernan 
Perry Lipe
George Manion
Pat McCauley
Carlton Molesworth
Dom Mullaney
Ray Ryan
Tony Thebo
Woodie Thornton

Short Prints:
Dahlen (Brooklyn/Boston)
Elberfeld (Washington)
Lundgren (Chicago) 
Smith (Boston and Chicago)

Backs: 
Looking for 

Hindu
Uzit
Tolstoi
El Principe
Cycle
American Beauty
Uzit
Broad Leaf
Carolina Brights
etc etc
Added some great ones, thanks Tony! List updated, please help me get some short prints while I’m at it too.

Was able to add another one, thanks Derek!

I picked up 2 OM SLers with writing on the back. Thebo and Bay. I'd like to use them as trade bait. PM If interested.
Dahlen brooklyn added thanks Luke! Keep em coming
Made some huge progress. Would really like a nice Foster.
I have this one available, will shoot you a PM as well, talk soon
